processingResourceMetaData.name: ArcCollectionReaderDescriptor
processingResourceMetaData.description: This UIMA reader reads documents stored in multiple Heritrix archive-files in the ARC-format (http://crawler.archive.org/articles/developer_manual/arcs.html). The reader scans an input directory for available files ending in *.arc.gz and then subsequently tries opening and processing all of them. It iterates through all records of that file and stores the text content of pdf in new CAS objects. It also adds some meta-information like URL and the name of the arc file source to the CAS. When processing of an arc file is complete, the reader logs the name of the finished file to a logfile whose name can be configured using the " "

configurationParameter.name: InputDirectory
configurationParameter.description: The directory where input ARC Files are stored

configurationParameter.name: ProcessedArcsLogfile
configurationParameter.description: Filename of a log file where the reader stores information about completed arc-files
